about_the_game:
This DLC includes two new puzzle packs, the Food and Drink DLC pack and the Miscellaneous DLC pack. Each pack contains 50 new puzzles, so this DLC contains 100 puzzles in total. The included puzzles range in size from 15x15 to 30x30.

These two packs are intended to be more difficult overall than the original puzzle pack included with Nonozle. They also feature minimal symmetry in comparison.

Overall puzzle counts by size:
  • 15x15 - 26 puzzles
  • 20x20 - 23 puzzles
  • 25x25 - 23 puzzles
  • 30x30 - 28 puzzles

Food and Drink DLC Pack

This pack contains nonograms depicting various foods and a few types of drink.

Puzzle counts by size:
  • 15x15 - 16 puzzles
  • 20x20 - 9 puzzles
  • 25x25 - 11 puzzles
  • 30x30 - 14 puzzles

Miscellaneous DLC Pack

This pack contains nonograms depicting images that don't follow any particular theme, just like the original puzzle pack included in the base game.

Puzzle counts by size:
  • 15x15 - 10 puzzles
  • 20x20 - 14 puzzles
  • 25x25 - 12 puzzles
  • 30x30 - 14 puzzles

Statistics

For the curious, here are some graphs depicting the pass count distribution of the game's puzzle packs. A puzzle's pass count is a way of quantifiably approximating its difficulty.

Original puzzle pack (first 200 puzzles that Nonozle launched with)


Abstract puzzle pack (100 abstract puzzles that don't form recognizable images, included free with a later update)


Food and Drink + Miscellaneous DLC (the puzzles included with this DLC)
